review: I Love that there is a Library List you can add items to so you can go back to that list rather than search through the plethora of the multitude of increasing entertainment that is added daily!What I would like to see Amazon! If you are also reading this! Is a way to send a trailer of a video you have watched that you want to share with a friend or family member in another household. If there was a way to do this Amazon would actually make more money!Plus they did work out on their Kindles where you can loan a kindle book to someone so why not be able to loan out a film you just bought to someone just like a kindle book!I would really like to see some sort of connectivity in that way!
